recipes.name: Potion of Healing
recipes.description: Brew a potion that restores 2d4+2 Hit Points when consumed.

recipes.name: Antitoxin
recipes.description: Brew an herbal remedy that grants Advantage on saving throws against poison for 1 hour.

recipes.name: Healer's Salve
recipes.description: Prepare a healing salve that can stabilize a creature at 0 Hit Points.

recipes.name: Herbal Poultice
recipes.description: Prepare a poultice that, when applied during a Short Rest, allows one creature to regain an additional 1d4 Hit Points per Hit Die spent.

recipes.name: Tea of Refreshment
recipes.description: Brew a soothing tea that removes one level of Exhaustion when consumed during a Short or Long Rest.
